entry.title: The Right Wrong Place In The Right Wrong Time
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,013Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 314

Summary: Soulmates are rare. Everyone has one, but *meeting* your soulmate is rare. In order to meet your soulmate, you need to shift. In order to shift, you need to be perfectly in sync with your soulmate. Your hearts need to beat in sync, your movements need to be in sync, perfectly mirroring one another. A blink, a *twitch* could be the difference between meeting your soulmate and not.Damian's soulmate shifts to him at the most awkward time possible.

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,643Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 216

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: Step into the Light
entry.summary:
Author: EditorOfEverything

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,793Chapters: 11/20Kudos: 677

Summary: A year after the defeat of Hawkmoth, Marinette is out of school, Guardian of the Miraculous, and unable to move on.When the Order challenges her titles, Marinette won’t give up without a fight. She arrives at the Order, determined to stay a Guardian and help the Order reclaim their place in the world—all while carrying the weight of her new power and responsibilities. Fortunately, Marinette has luck on her side.Damian Wayne is lost.He is nineteen, out of school, and feels out of place in his life. With no clear path forward, Damian follows his mother back to the League of Assassins to bury his past once and for all. Of course, nothing ever goes to plan.Upon learning that an ancient, magical organization has returned and is demanding his presence as the Demon Head, Damian makes the decision to accept his place in the League—making an enemy of his mother.Convinced they can reform their factions with each other’s help, Marinette and Damian must get through new enemies, old oaths, and their own building feelings—all while avoiding their fast-approaching deadline to be Soul Bound.Alone, it would be too much for anyone to handle. Together, they’ll face it all.

entry.title: We Should have Stayed in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: skhwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,818Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 8,463

Summary: The students of Gotham Academy were confused. It was International Friendship Week, and it was Gotham’s turn to host. Except no one wanted Gotham to host, not even Gotham! So the Directors of the Friendship Conference decided that it was in everybody’s best interest to skip the City of Crime and go straight to the City of Lights. Everyone thought that it was the perfect idea! Except for Paris. The Gothamites couldn’t help but laugh and scoff at the Parisians insistence that Gotham would be a much safer place than Paris, and nothing should change. And everyone, even one Damian Wayne, was thrilled when the petition went through, and they boarded the plane for Paris.And then…a giant baby…tried to eat the Eiffel Tower…they should have stayed in Gotham.

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 234,373Chapters: 17/75Kudos: 1,349

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham?Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby).A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?!___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work.Updating MonthlyMaribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.title: Hidden Angel
entry.summary:
Author: Writerclouds

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 150,154Chapters: 48/48Kudos: 427

Summary: Marinette Dupain Cheng, a familiar name throughout everyone as the sweet and kind girl that everyone adores. Everyone thought Marinette was a human but, she isn't what people see, she is actually an angel in disguise. Marinette is a unique angel, she has the ability to hide her wings, which is rare amongst angels. So, she could look like a human. She mostly spends her time in the human world to do tasks that she needs to accomplish. And one day, she was tasked to go to Gotham to restore balance there. She didn't expect to fall in love with a green eyed boy. He made her reconsider returning to Heaven.

entry.title: You Have a Brother, Right?
entry.summary:

entry.title: Response from HR
entry.summary:
Author: SimplyAnotherWriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,907Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 1,586

Summary: Marinette only agreed to work at WE because Jagged and Penny insisted that it would be okay. They reassured her that they had scouted the company out just as thoroughly as she had taught them to, and so there shouldn't be any problems.And there wasn't! At least...Not until her Boss and his family decided to keep hovering over her 24/7, with one son acting like an overprotective brother, and another son constantly showing up and clinging to her(he had no right to have such a pretty face!!!).o0oOo0oPART 2! entry.title: The Strike Of A Villainess
entry.summary:
Author: SleepyNov

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,807Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 236

Summary: Before she could finally figure out who Hawkmoth is, Marinette is thrown into an otome game of her favorite fandom— the DC Universe! Unfortunately, that’s not all there is to it:1. To get back to her old world, she has to save this one, of course.2. Her kwamis are no where to be found! Not to say she hasn’t found ANY kwamis.3. Everyone but the dc characters seem to be based off of people in her own world, including the person she became…Oh… and did I mention that she’s the villainess? Whoopsie!(Redid the summary and tags because it was bothering me. Hope you all like it better now!)
